author: makortel
body:
This PR has the following fixes to primary vertex validation
- Fill also the "not reconstructed" bin of `TruePVLocationIndexCumulative` histogram
- Fix the definition of "mistag" (now "signal PV is reconstructed, but is not the first one in the vertex collection")

In addition, add a recipe for running the validation without RECO using the 2-file solutions to the README.

Tested in 740pre6.
